title: Hunter shirt
description: brown shirt; coarse fabric; short sleeves; sides opening from sleeve seam to approximately 6 1/2 \" down; dreadlocks with rectangular leather covered objects attached; five horn (tusk-like) objects and 1 mirror also attached on one side;  four tusk-like objects and 2 mirrors on the other side; 2 rows of shells around neckline; 3 rows of 4 shells at center front; 3 rows 4, 5 and 6 shells respectively at center back
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
